member.name: T:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the and for document navigation.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.CreateNavigator(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Creates an XPath navigator object for navigating the specified document positioned on the specified node.
member.param: The document from which the XPath navigator is created.
The node where the navigator is initially positioned.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.CreateNavigator(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Creates a new XPath navigator object for navigating the specified document.
member.param: The document from which the XPath navigator is created.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.CreateNavigator(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Creates an XPath navigator for navigating the specified node.
member.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
member.returns: An XPath navigator object used to navigate the node. The XPath navigator is positioned on the node from which the method is called, not on the root of the document.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.SelectNodes(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String,System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager)
member.summary: Selects a list of nodes matching the specified XPath expression. Any prefixes found in the XPath expression are resolved using the supplied namespace manager.
member.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
A namespace manager to resolve XPath expression prefix namespaces.
member.returns: A collection of nodes that match the specified XPath expression.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.SelectNodes(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: Selects a list of nodes matching the specified XPath expression.
member.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
member.returns: A collection of nodes that match the specified XPath expression.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.SelectSingleNode(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String,System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager)
member.summary: Selects the first node that matches the XPath expression. Any prefixes found in the XPath expression are resolved using the supplied namespace manager.
member.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
A namespace manager to resolve XPath expression prefix namespaces.
member.returns: The first node that matches the XPath query, or if no matching node is found.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.SelectSingleNode(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: Selects the first node that matches the XPath expression.
member.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
member.returns: The first node that matches the XPath query, or if no matching node is found.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.ToXPathNavigable(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Creates an instance used for producing navigators.
member.param: The node in which the implementation should position newly created navigators.
